#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

#define Mid(l, r) ((l + r) >> 1)
#define Left(i) (i << 1)
#define Right(i) ((i << 1) + 1)

typedef long long ll;

const int max_N = 2e4 + 10;
const int max_M = 510;

int S[max_N];
char raw[max_N];
int dp[2][max_M] = {0};

int main ()
{
	int N;
	scanf ("%s", raw);
	N = strlen (raw);
	for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i)
		S[i] = raw[i] - '0';

	int Q, M, L, ans;
	scanf ("%d", &Q);
	while (Q--)
	{
		scanf ("%d%d", &M, &L);
		
		for (int i = 0; i < M; i++)
			dp[0][i] = 0;
		
		dp[0][S[0] % M] = 1;
		ans = (dp[0][L]);

		for (int i = 1; i < N; i++)
		{
			for (int j = 0; j < M; j++)
				dp[1][(j * 10) % M] += dp[0][j];
			for (int j = 0; j < M; j++)
			{
				dp[0][(j + S[i]) % M] = dp[1][j];
				dp[1][j] = 0;
			}
			dp[0][S[i] % M]++;
			ans += dp[0][L];
		}
		printf("%d\n", ans);
	}
}
